percent_cust_cob_US.description: percentage of individuals born in the US.

percent_cust_cob_nonUS_nonSanctionCtry.description: percentage of individuals born neither in the US nor in a country listed on a Sanctions list.

probs_risk_score.description: probability distribution of individual risk level. The user has to define a probability value for each customer risk level. The code creates a customer risk level ranging from 1 to n_risk_levels. Where n_risk_levels is the number of individual risk levels. It's important that the sum of the probability values are exactly equal to 1.

income_range.description: mapping of the income ranges for individuals.

income_brackets.description: percentage values assigned to each income range of individuals. The sum of the percentage values must be equal to 100.

residence_ctry_cd.description: Code of the residence country for individuals.

effective_risk_score_range.description: range of the customer effective risk scores for individuals.

cust_status_prob.description: probability values for each customer status code for individuals.

bus_domain_cd.description: codes for the different business domains for individuals.

jurisdiction_ctry_cd.description: Code to assign for the jurisdiction of a customer.
